npcCitizen1.speaker: Street Slave
lines: …The street remembers footsteps. Some kinder than others.
Food is mercy. Mercy is rare.
In Dreadheim, even gratitude is dangerous.

npcCitizen2.speaker: Hungry Woman
lines: Please… don’t draw attention to me.
If you have bread… no—never mind.

npcCitizen3.speaker: Citizen
lines: Some choices echo longer than screams.

npcCitizen4.speaker: Citizen
lines: Walk like you belong, or you’ll be made to.
